description: Retrieves information about a configuration deployment.

parameters.name: ApplicationId
parameters.description: The ID of the application that includes the deployment you want to get.

parameters.name: EnvironmentId
parameters.description: The ID of the environment that includes the deployment you want to get.

parameters.name: DeploymentNumber
parameters.description: The sequence number of the deployment.

nested_items.name: ApplicationId
nested_items.description: The ID of the application that was deployed.

nested_items.name: EnvironmentId
nested_items.description: The ID of the environment that was deployed.

nested_items.name: DeploymentStrategyId
nested_items.description: The ID of the deployment strategy that was deployed.

nested_items.name: ConfigurationProfileId
nested_items.description: The ID of the configuration profile that was deployed.

nested_items.name: DeploymentNumber
nested_items.description: The sequence number of the deployment.

nested_items.name: ConfigurationName
nested_items.description: The name of the configuration.

nested_items.name: ConfigurationLocationUri
nested_items.description: Information about the source location of the configuration.

nested_items.name: ConfigurationVersion
nested_items.description: The configuration version that was deployed.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description of the deployment.

nested_items.name: DeploymentDurationInMinutes
nested_items.description: Total amount of time the deployment lasted.

nested_items.name: GrowthType
nested_items.description: The algorithm used to define how percentage grew over time.

nested_items.name: GrowthFactor
nested_items.description: The percentage of targets to receive a deployed configuration during each interval.

nested_items.name: FinalBakeTimeInMinutes
nested_items.description: The amount of time that AppConfig monitored for alarms before considering the deployment to be complete and no longer eligible for automatic rollback.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The state of the deployment.

nested_items.name: EventLog
nested_items.description: A list containing all events related to a deployment. The most recent events are displayed first.

nested_items.name: EventType
nested_items.description: The type of deployment event. Deployment event types include the start, stop, or completion of a deployment; a percentage update; the start or stop of a bake period; and the start or completion of a rollback.

nested_items.name: TriggeredBy
nested_items.description: The entity that triggered the deployment event. Events can be triggered by a user, AppConfig, an Amazon CloudWatch alarm, or an internal error.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: A description of the deployment event. Descriptions include, but are not limited to, the following:
The Amazon Web Services account or the Amazon CloudWatch alarm ARN that initiated a rollback.
The percentage of hosts that received the deployment.

nested_items.type: in the case of an internal error
nested_items.description: A recommendation to attempt a new deployment (in the case of an internal error).

nested_items.name: ActionInvocations
nested_items.description: The list of extensions that were invoked as part of the deployment.

nested_items.name: ExtensionIdentifier
nested_items.description: The name, the ID, or the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the extension.

nested_items.name: ActionName
nested_items.description: The name of the action.

nested_items.name: Uri
nested_items.description: The extension URI associated to the action point in the extension definition. The URI can be an Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for one of the following: an Lambda function, an Amazon Simple Queue Service queue, an Amazon Simple Notification Service topic, or the Amazon EventBridge default event bus.

nested_items.name: RoleArn
nested_items.description: An Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for an Identity and Access Management assume role.

nested_items.name: ErrorMessage
nested_items.description: The error message when an extension invocation fails.

nested_items.name: ErrorCode
nested_items.description: The error code when an extension invocation fails.

nested_items.name: InvocationId
nested_items.description: A system-generated ID for this invocation.

nested_items.name: OccurredAt
nested_items.description: The date and time the event occurred.

nested_items.name: PercentageComplete
nested_items.description: The percentage of targets for which the deployment is available.

nested_items.name: StartedAt
nested_items.description: The time the deployment started.

nested_items.name: CompletedAt
nested_items.description: The time the deployment completed.

nested_items.name: AppliedExtensions
nested_items.description: A list of extensions that were processed as part of the deployment. The extensions that were previously associated to the configuration profile, environment, or the application when StartDeployment was called.

nested_items.name: ExtensionId
nested_items.description: The system-generated ID of the extension.

nested_items.name: ExtensionAssociationId
nested_items.description: The system-generated ID for the association.

nested_items.name: VersionNumber
nested_items.description: The extension version number.

nested_items.name: Parameters
nested_items.description: One or more parameters for the actions called by the extension.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: KmsKeyArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name of the Key Management Service key used to encrypt configuration data. You can encrypt secrets stored in Secrets Manager, Amazon Simple Storage Service (Amazon S3) objects encrypted with SSE-KMS, or secure string parameters stored in Amazon Web Services Systems Manager Parameter Store.

nested_items.name: KmsKeyIdentifier
nested_items.description: The Key Management Service key identifier (key ID, key alias, or key ARN) provided when the resource was created or updated.

nested_items.name: VersionLabel
nested_items.description: A user-defined label for an AppConfig hosted configuration version.
